'''Stone Cup-Shaped Pool''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Stone Cup-Shaped Pool is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
